title: logo typeface
content:
Hi,

Can anyone identify the font used in this logo?

Thanks in advance

Steve

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131730im_/http:/typophile.com/files/logo-scan_5687.jpg)

Font: 

 Transformers 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131730/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")
author: Steve Brown

comments.content: It looks like **[Transformers](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131730/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-2&ffam=Transformers%20-%20Normal&fid=d2731284a5516c8474bdeb76ba771f54&fsize=60&text=NSA&fit=1)** by Neale Davidson [2000] + the texture and outline
